name: By Odin, where's my Axe?
description:
By Odin, Where's My Axe? 

Deep in the forest lies a little viking village, where the people are living a peaceful and … drunken life! The villager are enjoying their time to fullest with a lot of alcoholic beverage, until one day their idyllic environment is threatened to be eradicated by an unknown dark force. To save the village and this lifestyle, one little dwarf takes it upon himself to stand against the threat and saves what‘s dear to him...beer. 

This game is a small viking simulator where you play a viking dwarf. Your goal is to stand ready to defend your home from the incoming dark forces.  The only problem is that the dwarf – like always in this village – had a long night of partying and alcoholic consumption. The party went a little bit to wild, so that you need to find your armor and equipment first, which is scattered around the whole village. 

Stand up and find your gear! Should you fail, the village is doomed to be eradicated from the face of the earth.

Instructions:

Unpack and have fun! 

Controls:

WASD – Movement
Space – Jump

Made during Global Game Jam 21 in Munich/Bavaria by: 

  • Armin Theisz
  •  Joel Laqua
  •  Lukas Kurth 
  • Katharina Pede
  •  Felix Schäfer 
  • Tony Ngo 
  • Tristan Firsching 
  • Chris Kohler
